doc:
Barbara Bedford (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbara_Bedford_(actress) 0 Barbara Bedford (born Violet May Rose; July 19, 1903 – October 25, 1981) was an American actress who appeared in dozens of silent movies. Her career declined after the introduction of sound, but she continued to appear in small roles until 1945. Barbara_Bedford ( born Violet_May_Rose ; July_19_,_1903 – October_25 , 1981 ) was an_American_actress who appeared in dozens of silent_movies . Her_career declined after the_introduction of sound , but she continued_to_appear in small_roles until 1945 .
